This method will take the user to the Add Customer screen.

This method returns the user back to the Main Appointments Screen.

This method will return the user to the main appointments screen and prompt the user with a confirmation window.

This method will return the user back to the Reports menu.

This method will return the user back to the Reports menu.

This method will return the user back to the Reports menu.
onCancelAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
This method will allow the user to cancel any and/or all data input into the fields.
onCancelCust(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomer
This method will cancel any input from the user in the Add Customer screen and return the user to the Customer Screen.
onCancelModifyAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
This method cancels any input from the user and returns them to the Main Appointment Screen.
onCancelModifyCust(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomer
This method cancels any input from the user and returns them to the Main Appointment Screen.
onClear(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreen
This method clears out any input from the fields in the screen.
onContactSchedule(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsMenu
This method takes the user to the Contacts Schedule screen.
onCountryCombo(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomer
This method will display the proper division (region) that corresponds to whatever country the user has selected.

This method will display the proper division (region) that corresponds to whatever country the user has selected.

This method takes the user to the Reports by Customer ID screen.

This method brings the user to the Add Customer screen.
onDeleteAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainAppointmentScreen
This method deletes the selected appointment and its data from the database.
onDeleteCust(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerScreen
This method will delete the selected customer and its data from the database.
onExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreen
This method exits and closes the app.
onExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainAppointmentScreen
This method will exit the program.
onLogin(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreen
This method validates the user's input credentials and connects them to the database and brings them to the main appointment screen upon success.
onModifyAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainAppointmentScreen
This method will bring the user to the Modify Appointment screen if they have an appointment selected on the screen.
onModifyCust(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerScreen
This method will bring the user to the Modify Customer screen if they have a customer selected on the screen.
onReports(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainAppointmentScreen
This method brings the user to the Reports Menu screen.
onSaveAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
This method will save all of the input entered by the user to add a new appointment to the database.
onSaveCust(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomer
This method will save input from the user for adding customers into the database.
onSaveModifyAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
This method saves any changes made to the appointment fields and returns the user to the Main Appointments screen.
onSaveModifyCust(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomer
This method saves any changes made to the customer fields and returns the user to the Main Appointments screen.
onSelectContact(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ContactsReport
This method will retrieve the contact ID from the contact data in the database.
onTotalCustAppts(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsMenu
This method takes the user to the Total Customer Reports screen.
onViewAll(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainAppointmentScreen
This method will filter to see all appointments.
onViewMonth(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainAppointmentScreen
This method will filter all appointments to the current month's appointments.
onViewWeek(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainAppointmentScreen
This method will filter all appointments to the current week's appointments.
openConnection() - Static method in class helper.JDBC
This method makes the connection to the MySQL database.
